name: Castletrainia: Gavotte of the Mixed Diesel-Electric
name_original: Castletrainia: Gavotte of the Mixed Diesel-Electric
description:
What if Castle Dracula was a train? -- @tenseperfected

castletrainia -- @replacewythy

After 100 years, the immortal vampire Dracula's plot to consume humanity is back on track. Battle(?) your way through four carriages filled with the Children of the Night--and assorted passengers--to make your way through to Vlad himself as you speed through the Transylvanian night.

The latest game from Future Perfect Form (@tenseperfected) includes:

• A jaw-dropping TWO endings!

• Stunning emoji-based graphics that will absolutely NOT degrade gracefully!

• Hamhanded labor politics!

• Four traincars of goosebumpifying action!

• I've never played a Castlevania game!

Controls: Move the player avatar ("@") by clicking on a compass direction. Complete all quests for the best ending!

CREDITS:

@tenseperfected - programming, writing

@replacewythy - title

@somepx (somepx.itch.io)- font 'fantex'
